about_the_game:
The Unlock Assets Pack – does exactly what it says on the tin, perfect for the gamer who's pressed for time! In the tour alone there are no less than 100 decals, 12 stunning locations, 16 handcrafted cues and 12 Ball sets. Want to bypass the unlocks and be handed all of these, then download the Unlock Assets Pack! Giving you the fun of the game, but with the unlock-able assets collected during the tour, unlocked for your gaming pleasure! Including locations, characters, decals and cues

[CAUTION: Achievement hunters - this does not unlock the tour, so If you've unlocked some of it already, you will only be able to unlock the items which you are yet to unlock.]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, SP3/WINDOWS VISTA SP2/WINDOWS 7
  • Processor: Dual Core, AMD/INTEL 2.6 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB OF VIDEO MEMORY ATI RADEON X1600/NVIDIA GEFORCE 7600/INTEL HD 2000 OR HIGHER
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
